title: Binary Search Implementation
description:
Implement the binary search algorithm.

## Requirements

1. Create a function `binary_search(arr, target)` that:
   - Takes a sorted list and a target value
   - Returns the index of the target if found
   - Returns -1 if not found
2. Use the binary search approach (divide and conquer)

## Expected Output

```
Found 7 at index 3
Value 10 not found (-1)
```
